title: Vvang
author: Vvang
content: I am seeing people building .name on the blockchain this days like ENS and other is there any benefit of doing this at all or people just want their name or company name in the blockchain?

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: It all lies down into business and future value. There's no difference in the typical way of getting good domain names and this trend is likely going to be the next. Just to get the idea, go on look for the past trends like ICO, NFT, P2E, IEO and all of those.Once the trend for this ENS, there will be another build up but AFAIK, this is related to the web 3.0 and that will be also the trend possible trend so it all goes down in connection.

comments.author: ANSEL_2.0
comments.body: As stupid as it looks I will still advice you to create a BC domain name if you can because who knows? A good benefit might pop up tomorrow for all domain name owners and it doesn't cost a lot to create one.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 10:23:22 PMI am seeing people building .name on the blockchain this days like ENS and other is there any benefit of doing this at all or people just want their name or company name in the blockchain? Simply some people wants to easily remember there address and show off there assets since not all people wants privacy on crypto this days because everyone is still obligated to pay there taxes and track all there transactions for filing tax report unlike before that you can really feel the anonymous vibe without regulators badgering on all of your crypto transactions.This name service project really kill the purpose of decentralisation but new investors on crypto don't prioritized privacy anymore and just focus on gains.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 10:23:22 PMI am seeing people building .name on the blockchain this days like ENS and other is there any benefit of doing this at all or people just want their name or company name in the blockchain? My thought on this would be that they could be trying to book a space by doing that registration and expecting someone to take fancy to it and buy it off them. It's a business strategy for them. I've read where companies and business concerns buy existing domain names that rhyme with their business. I think that should be the game plan of those doing .name thing now.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 10:23:22 PMI am seeing people building .name on the blockchain this days like ENS and other is there any benefit of doing this at all or people just want their name or company name in the blockchain? Benefits are their product got expose and if its useful then people will buy their tokens and used it to their desire. If its profitable or good then it will sell and developers would earn out of it. Sometimes royalty or if they have shares of tokens from creating the projects. Well it depends, case to case basis.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Web 3 is the future internet which has already taken over most businesses and in the near future most ENS will have been bought by individuals who will plan on selling them in the future for more profit. the best is creating as many ENS as possible with the plan to sell off in the future, in the blockchain industry every thing is a potential asset even the most craziest technology

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Have not heard of '.name' but here are few reasons domains get purchased : In hope for airdrops, some for domain squatting, some just like to get on wheel also it looks much better than addresses.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: There can be both practical and speculative purposes for this. One, that would indeed be a lot more convenient to have Darker.eth than 0x23GH68ADEK34LEO98AD38QH93LND935LQND193. Second, your domain does not just represent a single address; it represents your website, your addresses, and others. Third, you can also put your brand or company in your domain. That would be a kind of promotion. Finally, of course, you can sell your domain with a profit.

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: There is such a thing called the unity of the name in branding. The Internet is a platform for business promotion. I would bet that people are just trying to make the most of the available opportunities.
